mapper.insert: insert into odr_users( Uid, password,Email, FirstName,MiddleName, LastName, FirstName_kana, MiddleName_kana, LastName_kana, CompanyName, PlatformId, LanguageId, Status, MessageFrequency, TermsConfirmed, DeleteFlag, LastLoginDate, RegisterDate, LastModifiedDate, UserType ) values( #{Uid}, #{password}, #{Email}, #{FirstName}, #{MiddleName}, #{LastName}, #{FirstName_Kana}, #{MiddleName_Kana}, #{LastName_Kana}, #{CompanyName}, #{PlatformId}, #{LanguageId}, 0, 100, 1, 0, NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), 0 )
